---
name: Error Handling
about: Handle incomplete or invalid LangGraph code
title: "[Phase-1] Handle partial or invalid LangGraph workflows"
labels: robustness, design, phase-1
---

## Description
Define behavior for partially analyzable or invalid LangGraph code.

## Strategy
- Fail-fast or best-effort?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool does not crash
- [ ] Clear warnings emitted
